eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Alamosa; Archuleta; Chaffee; Conejos; Costilla; Custer; Fremont; Gunnison; Hinsdale; Huerfano; Mineral; Rio Grande; Saguache, CO; AT 02:59 PM ON SEP 25, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 05:59 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Colorado Bureau of Investigation with and AMBER Child Abduction Alert. We have received this important announcement regarding an abducted Child in Thornton, Colorado. The Thornton Police Department is searching for 14 year old Phillip Torres Junior last seen in the vicinity of I25 and I70 at about ten thirty this morning. Phillip is described as a hispanic male, brown hair, brown eyes, five feet two inches tall, two hundred pounds. Phillip Torres Junior was last seen wearing a grey baseball cap, black hoodie, and blue jeans. Investigators believe noncustodial father Phillip Torres Senior may have taken Phillip Torres Junior and may be traveling in a two thousand and four, grey, Chevy, Silverado bearing Colorado license plate D, I, U, I, 6, 6, that was last seen at US-285 and Hot Springs Road in Poncha Springs, Colorado, at 3:06PM. If you have any information regarding this abduction, immediately call 9 1  1.
